questions.question: How do I send a gift to a Darling?
questions.answer: Just choose something from her diary or wishlist, add it to your cart, and complete your purchase. She'll see your treat right away, and you'll get notified when it's on its way.

questions.question: Can I create my own wishlist too?
questions.answer: Absolutely! You can create your own wishlist and share it with your friends and family. It's a great way to let people know what you'd love to receive.

questions.question: Is shipping discreet?
questions.answer: Yes, all packages are shipped in discreet, unmarked packaging. We understand privacy is important, so your order will arrive without any branding or indication of what's inside.

questions.question: What payment methods can I use?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and other popular payment methods. Your payment information is always secure and encrypted.

questions.question: Will my Darling know it was me who sent the gift?
questions.answer: That's entirely up to you! You can choose to include your name or send it anonymously. The choice is yours.

questions.question: Do you ship internationally?
questions.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary depending on your location.

questions.question: What if I need help with my order?
questions.answer: Our support team is here to help! You can contact us through our support page, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
